definition: to count/to count as/to regard as/to enumerate (sb's shortcomings)

sentences.english: High-concept science-fiction movies tend to go in two different directions.
sentences.chinese: 高智商科幻电影通常有两种截然不同的路数。

sentences.english: However, soccer players know that there is a proper way to head the ball.
sentences.chinese: 然而，足球运动员是知道头球路数的。
